page.title: 14Roads & houses:SW.Cheshire.
page.content: The north-south route of the busy A41(T) Chester to Whitchurch road almost bissects the area & carries heavy container lorries as well as cars & buses.Three minor roads off it lead to Tattenhall(east along Chester Road),west to Bruera on Platts Lane(this having a vehicle weight limit of 3 tons partly to prevent its use by the army from Chester although it is used for army training runs) & to Hatton House & Hall.A section of Long Lane to Waverton is in the NE.of the area.There is linear settlement along all of these roads with farms & single houses as well as some businesses but there is a group of buildings at Gatesheath as well as at Saighton with its 3 minor roads. Off the A41,with its empty lodge to let,is the disused "Waverton Approach" to the Duke of Westminster's Eaton Hall.
